pageContext.claim: “You know I had a business transaction with him [special counsel Robert Mueller] that I've reported many times that you people don't talk about. But I had a nasty business transaction with him and other things.”
pageContext.analysis: Without offering any evidence, Trump has claimed Mueller resigned his membership at the Trump National Golf Club in Sterling, Va., in 2011 because of the disagreement over fees. The president believes Mueller still holds a grudge against him over the matter. Mueller, who was FBI director at the time of the alleged dispute, denied the incident and any potential hard feelings. “Mr. Mueller left the club in October 2011 without dispute,” a spokesman for Mueller said.
